value.desc: Model of the component defining if it is shown or hidden to the user; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

reveal.desc: Enable 'reveal' mode; Takes into account user scroll to temporarily show/hide footer

elevated.desc: Adds a default shadow to the footer

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component; Suggestion: QToolbar
